features.name: Session and authentication
features.description: Handles role-based login for admins and FC users, persists session to secure storage, restores on launch, and registers push tokens for signed-in users.

features.name: Home dashboard and onboarding progress
features.description: Landing screen shows admin metrics or FC onboarding progress, quick links to key flows, latest notices/messages, and real-time updates via Supabase channels.

features.name: Allowance consent workflow
features.description: Guides FCs through allowance agreement steps, tracks slide completion, collects temp ID and consent date, updates profile status, and notifies admins.

features.name: Document upload and notification
features.description: FCs upload required documents to Supabase storage with progress feedback; admins receive notifications and can review statuses for each document.

features.name: Exam registration and management
features.description: Provides life/non-life exam application forms and admin registration dashboards for scheduling and tracking applicant status across both exam types.

features.name: Messaging and notices
features.description: Real-time 1:1 chat between FCs and admins with media/file attachments, plus admin notice creation and FC notice viewing for broadcast updates.

features.name: Appointment and profile management
features.description: Supports FC profile editing, appointment URL handling, and admin oversight of onboarding steps including mobile appointment scheduling.
